title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations are not necessary for a visit to the Sandburg Home. Daily house tour tickets are sold first-come, first-served. Groups of 10 or more should visit our group tour page to plan their visit.   Interested in Commercial Photography or a Wedding at the Sandburg Home? Please review the information in the documents listed below for guideance on planning your special event or use. Please contact the park's Special Use Permit Coordinator at 828-693-4178 to discuss your event. Procedures and Fees for Planning a Wedding at the Sandburg Home (word) - Please read this before you fill out a form to request a wedding permit.
